<h1 style="float:left;font-size:50px;vertical-align:middle"> Carbon Neutral SE Asia </h1>
<img src="images/logo_us_state_department_color.png" style="float:right;height:100px;"> <img src="images/logo_pnnl.png" style="float:right;height:100px;">
<!-------------------------->
<!-------------------------->
<p align="center"> <img src="images/divider.png"></p>

The State Department's Bureau of Energy Resources (ENR) together with The U.S. Department of Energy’s Pacific Northwest National Laboratory (PNNL) is collaborating with local partners in selected ASEAN countries to supplement existing net-zero, carbon neutral, digitalization, and Smart City roadmap plans by providing integrated modeling and assessment capabilities. PNNL’s Global Change Analysis Model (GCAM) is a global model integrating socio-economics, energy, land use, water, and climate systems. PNNL will use GCAM to explore multi-level governance strategies at both the national and city scales to evaluate a decarbonization pathways.
